meanings.definition: A system of transferring money electronically from one bank account to another.
meanings.sent1: I used the giro to send money to my friend online.
meanings.sent2: The company uses a giro to pay its employees every month.
meanings.sent3: The giro made paying bills so much easier!
meanings.sent4: Her giro of funds was swift and efficient.
meanings.sent5: With the giro, financial transactions are seamless.

meanings.definition: A circular or spiral motion or path.
meanings.sent1: The leaves twirled in a gentle giro as they fell from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The figure skater performed a perfect giro on the ice.
meanings.sent3: The giro of the tornado was both terrifying and fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The galaxy spun in a majestic giro through space.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's giro was graceful and mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A type of bicycle race or ride.
meanings.sent1: He participated in a challenging giro through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The giro attracted cyclists from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The giro race was full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: She conquered the giro with determination and skill.
meanings.sent5: The giro tested the riders' endurance and speed.
